boardgame.name: Triumvirate
boardgame.description: In ripis Rubiconis passus militis bellum civile fert et movet cursum eventorum e quibus imperator surget. Quomodo dominabis proelia quae in agro, in senatu, et per vias Romae accident?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;On the banks of the Rubicon a legionnaire_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s footstep brings Civil War and sets upon a course of events from which an emperor will emerge. How will you master the battles that are to come on the field, in the senate and through the streets of Rome?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Triumvirate is a fast-paced game for two that requires subtle hand management and card play to win consistently. The mechanisms in the core rules make for a very satisfying, imperfect information player trick taking game. In addition to the core game there is a drafting variant that removes randomness from play beyond the initial card deal._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game is currently available in Classical Latin, English, German, French, Catalan, Polish, Spanish and Dutch._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

nuovo sigillato new shrink-wrapped spedizione con corriere espresso 24 ore in tutta italia Per i costi di spedizione vai a: http://www.lpg.it/eg/6-stima-costi-spedizione-estero.htm To check shipping costs go to: http://www.lpg.it/eg/6-stima-costi-spedizione-estero.htm paypal accepted (add 4%) mandami la tua e-mail . ti inviero’ lista completa con offerte e bundle! Give me your e-mail I ‘ll send you complete list with sales and bundles! nuovo sigillato new shrink-wrapped paypal accepted (add 4%) * * * * * ITALIANO * * * * * Se mi mandi il tuo indirizzo e-mail, ti invierò una lista completa delle offerte e dei bundle! Costi di spedizione in Italia: da 1,00 € a 6,90 € (hai la possibilità di diminuire fino ad azzerare i costi di trasporto acquistando piu_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; giochi! Spedizione con corriere espresso 24 ore in tutta la penisola (48 per le isole.) Costi di spedizione nel resto d_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;Europa (la prima cifra è per pacchi di dimensioni fino a quelle di una scatola standrad Kosmos, la seconda cifra per dimensioni superiori): vedi elenco qui sotto (nella parte scritta in Inglese). Costi di spedizione nel resto del mondo: vedi elenco qui sotto (nella parte scritta in Inglese). NOTA: si richiede un acquisto minimo di 50 euro per i paesi non europei! * * * * * ENGLISH * * * * * If you give me your e-mail, I‘ll send you a complete list of available titles and bundles! Shipping cost to: Italy: from 1,00 € to 6,90 € (for ANY number of games) Europe: small package (up to the size of a standard kosmos box) / big package France (continental) 15 € / 19 € France (Corsica) 26 € / 32 € Switzerland 19 € / 24 € Austria 15 € / 19 € Germany 15 € / 19 € Slovenia 19 € / 24 € Denmark 15 € / 19 € United Kingdom 15 € / 19 € Belgium, Holland, Luxemburg: 15 € / 19 € Spain (continental) 15 € / 19 € Spain (Ceuta/Meilla, Andorra, Baleari,Giblatar,Islands): 19 € / 24 € Portugal (continental) 19 € / 24 € Portugal (islands): please ask Ireland 26 € / 32 € Poland 26 € / 32 € Czech Republic 26 € / 32€ Slovakia 26 € / 32 € Hungary 26 € / 32 € Romania 26 € / 32 € Bulgaria 26 € / 32 € Sweden 23 € / 26 € Norway 26 € / 32 € Greece 27 € / 32 € other european countries: please ask! U.S.A. (except Alaska and Hawaii): from 25 € to 50 € depending on size Canada, Alaska, Hawaii: from 43 € to 75 € depending on size Australia, New Zealand: from 48 € to 80 € depending on size rest of the world: please ask! NOTE: non-european countries are required a minimum purchase of 50 €!

I have three copies of this. You can choose whichever one you want. 1. Brand new in original package. Box and shrink wrap in excellent/perfect condition. 2nd edition in the normal retail packaging. 2. The black box edition. Played once or twice but you can hardly tell. Says _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;BGG Con 2009 Special Edition_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; on the back of the box. 3. Plastic clamshell box. Played a number of times. Cards are showing some wear, but not much. Plastic case has a small crack on the back that does not affect functionality. $5.35 shipping in a flat rate priority box or I could probably send this First Class Mail parcel for about $3.
